          <title>
            <string language="en">Natural fertilisers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natürliche Düngemittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Engrais normaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fertilizantes naturais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fertilizzanti naturali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσικά λιπάσματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fertilizantes naturales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams indicate some sources of natural fertilisers: a compost heap, animal manure and bacteria in the roots of clover.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clover</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compost heap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">manure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">natural fertilisers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Roots</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen einige Quellen der 
natürlichen Düngemittel an: ein Mischunghaufen, ein 
Tierdüngemittel und ein Bakterium in den Wurzeln des Klees.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes indiquent quelques sources des 
engrais normaux : un segment de mémoire de compost, des engrais
d'animaux et des bactéries dans les racines du trèfle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas indicam algumas fontes de 
fertilizantes naturais: um heap do compost, um manure animal e 
umas bactérias nas raizes do trevo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi indicano alcune sorgenti dei 
fertilizzanti naturali: un mucchio della composta, un concime 
animale ed i batteri nelle radici del trifoglio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα δείχνουν μερικές πηγές φυσικών 
λιπασμάτων: ένας σωρός λιπάσματος, ένα ζωικό λίπασμα και 
βακτηρίδια στις ρίζες του τριφυλλιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas indican algunas fuentes de 
fertilizantes naturales: un montón del estiércol vegetal, un 
abono animal y bacterias en las raíces del trébol.</string>
          </description>
